JOIN the "FELLOWSHIP" on PATREON: http://bit.ly/JoinTheBMC_Fellowship
OFFICIAL BMC MERCH: http://bit.ly/BMCmerch

#BlackMagicCraft #Episode164 #Sponsored

In this video I create 5 spell effects for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition using mostly hot glue. This are all cheap and accessible builds that can be translated to many different spells.

Thanks to Surebonder (FPC) for sponsoring this video and for supporting hobby content creators!

Check out the Surebonder product line on Amazon:

(USA) https://amzn.to/2ITdkTZ
(Canada) https://amzn.to/31jjsLN
(UK) https://amzn.to/32sesWM

They have a wide range of products but the two models I selected that best suited my needs for terrain building are the *DT-320F* (mini) and *DT-360F* (full size). Both are dual temperature with 30 minute auto off feature.


(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

title: Hot Glue Spell Effects for Dungeons & Dragons 5E
